casebody.data:
ARMSTRONG
v.
ARMSTRONG. No. 136P07. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 13, 2007. Daniel S. Bullard, Gibsonville, for Margaret Armstrong.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 11th day of April 2007 by Defendant for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 13th day of April 2007."
